pullRequest.title: [JBPM-9407] Spring Boot - Multiple Data Sources and Pluggable Variable Persistence
pullRequest.bodyText:
Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/JBPM-9407
Overwrite for spring boot for adding custom entity managers
depends on:
kiegroup/jbpm#1769

nodes.bodyText: Though it's not mandatory, perhaps it's more clear if "Override" annotation is explicitly shown.
In the parent invocation, ("entityManagerFactory", emf) is also added, shouldn't it be redundant?

+1
Though this could override entityManagerFactory key entry in the map
